articles.author: Ryan Gilliam
articles.title: Puzzle Quest 3 is free-to-play, launching in 2021 - Polygon
articles.description: On Thursday, 505 Games and the franchise’s original developer, Infinity Plus Two, announced Puzzle Quest 3. The third entry in the Puzzle Quest series will be free-to-play, with a release date on PC, mobile, and other platforms scheduled for this year.
articles.content: The beloved series goes free-to-play across multiple platforms
